settings.text: Refresh your skin from within with our delicious watermelon-infused collagen powder ‚Äì designed to support glowing skin, strong nails, & healthy joints.

settings.main_description: Feel good inside and out with our Vegan Collagen Powder ‚Äî a clean, plant-powered formula designed to support glowing skin, stronger hair, and overall wellness. Made without animal collagen or added sugar, it's the perfect daily ritual for beauty that feels as good as it looks.

Made without animal collagen or added sugar, it's the perfect daily ritual for beauty that feels as good as it looks.

settings.content: Say hello to your new daily beauty ritual. Our Watermelon Collagen Powder blends the power of premium marine collagen with the freshness of real watermelon flavor ‚Äî so you can nourish your skin, hair, nails, and joints from the inside out.
Our premium marine collagen is sourced from the finest ingredients to support your beauty routine from within.
Packed with superfoods and antioxidants to enhance your natural glow and support overall wellness.

settings.step_description: Add 2 heaped scoops (1 serving) to your tea or coffee.
You can also mix it into your smoothies or oatmeal.
Mix the product in thoroughly. For best results, consume 1 serving per day.
Store the product in a cool, dark location away from direct sunlight

settings.name: Caitlin B.
settings.testimonial_text:
As a mother of 3 children, has lost over 14kg in total. She wants to show her kids that it's possible to be a busy parent and still take care of oneself. Caitlin is very happy with the results she has achieved again. The shakes she uses are described as delicious and filling, and they do not affect her milk supply (as she is exclusively breastfeeding her 5-month-old child). Most importantly, the shakes have been effective for Caitlin.

settings.subtitle: Clinically shown to diminish fine lines and wrinkles in just 28 days

settings.question: Who can use EVOO collagen powder?
settings.answer: EVOO collagen powder is formulated for both men and women looking to support their skin, hair, nails, and overall health. It's perfect for anyone over the age of 18.

settings.question: How do I use EVOO collagen powder?
settings.answer: Simply mix one scoop (approximately 10g) of EVOO collagen powder with 200-300ml of water, juice, or your favorite beverage. Stir well and consume daily for best results. Can be taken at any time of day.

settings.question: Is EVOO collagen powder safe?
settings.answer: Yes, EVOO collagen powder is completely safe when used as directed. It's made from high-quality, natural ingredients and is third-party tested for purity and potency. However, consult with your healthcare provider if you have any specific health concerns.

settings.question: Is EVOO collagen powder suitable for vegetarians or vegans?
settings.answer: Our EVOO collagen powder is derived from marine sources, making it suitable for pescatarians but not for vegetarians or vegans. We recommend checking our plant-based alternatives if you follow a vegetarian or vegan lifestyle.

settings.title: Need to know more? Don't forget to ask!
